attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I saw a Cheeto and I thought it would send me free food. Unfortunately when I opened the app I was disturbingly shown a picture of Annoying Orange wearing a mop on his head. I was slightly confused so I continued to look through the app. This was a mistake. Somehow the app went through my headphones and confiscated all of my earwax. This makes me very angry because I was going to use that to make my special face cream. I am leaving this review to make sure nobody else gets their earwax taken. Do not recommend.
attributes.title: Very disappointed

attributes.review: When it opens it immediately tries to steal you private information like an app from a third rate dictatorial nation (but unlike those apps it offers absolutely no entertainment).  If you’re not willing to provide them with information the app does absolutely nothing.  So unless you start off by signing your soul away this app is nothing but a waste of space...in fact it’s just a waste of space much like the person it attempts to hype.  To the trash with both of them as they are all useless.
attributes.title: Terrible App

attributes.review: Honestly this is just a crappy app once you open it you see a login and sign up option in the back you see a Chido holding up a fist and I first I was scared and confused and now I have dizziness nausea and I’m throwing up all over the place I am disgusted and so confused and don’t even get me started on the mental pain I’m receiving as soon as I open the app I immediately started crying I don’t know what came over me but I just started crying and and I’ve been physically and mentally suffering ever since I’ve open this app.
attributes.title: Horrible👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻

attributes.review: I downloaded the app with hopes to get more information about our country. As soon as I opened the app harmful radiation began to leak from my phone. My pet hamster that was running on its wheel began to screech in hysteria. He stopped breathing and collapsed in its cage. The radio began to turn to a country station and the volume increase to the point were my ears began to bleed. I’m currently in the hospital with a high bill from erupted eardrums. I won’t be able to pay my medical bills and my hamster sadly passed away. All thanks to this horrible app.
attributes.title: Absurd. Fake news. Horrible

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to pay my respects to the great orange when suddenly I was attacked by a Cheeto! It was a trauma inducing event. I was in the hospital for weeks and now I have to attend therapy. Not only was the Cheeto attack traumatic, but so was the things I saw on the app. I don’t think I will ever be the same again. This is completely unacceptable, I feel like I have been deprived of my childhood. I don’t want to go into detail about what I saw because that isn’t fair to anyone but I’m warning you not to download this app, it is terrifying.
attributes.title: I have to go to therapy now

attributes.review: Once I got this app I opened it and I was shocked to find out that I got a call from boss baby at 3am!!! 😮😮😮😧😧😧😧😦😦😦😦😦😦😦😦😦😦😦😦😦😦😦😦😦😦😧😧😧😧😦😦😧😧😦😧😧😦😦😱😱😱😱😱😱😱😱😱😱😱😱😱😱😨😨😨 and the next day I noticed my 344mil. Screwdriver was gone! I was as scared! I went back to the app and found the president of the United States holding my screwdriver 😱 I knew it was my screwdriver too because it had a hentai sticker on it! So after being angry I was about to stress eat until I noticed my washing machine was gone and the big problem was that’s where I store my food!! 😭😭😭
attributes.title: ⚠️WARNING⚠️

attributes.review: I downloaded this and was absolutely disappointed. I have many things to say. The app took away my pet elephant while I was in the pool with my pajamas. I cried and demanded him back but, he was gone. This app is exceeding, trifling considering ranting criticizing concerning adopting fitting wording being exhibiting was displaying, notwithstanding ridiculing, surpassing boasting swelling reasoning, respecting correcting erring writing, and deceiving arguing during debating. Also an ad popped up and I accidentally clicked on it and guess WHAT?! Trump’s little peen peen was just on my screen (I am now scarred). Pls DO NOT use this app!!🥰
attributes.title: Disgusting!

attributes.review: i downloaded this app because i planned on going to a rally for my lord and savior President Donald Trump, and as soon as i entered the app to register for a spot, the screen went black for a FULL MINUTE and then showed an absolutely frightening photograph of a monster with bulgy eyes, a terribly wrinkly and orange face, cotton candy on it’s head, and MICROSCOPIC LITTLE HANDS. i had heart attack. i am currently typing this from my hospital bed, crying from the memories of that awful monster. in conclusion, don’t get this app because it with give you a heart attack. best case scenario.
attributes.title: terrible. awful. i am scarred for life.

attributes.review: This app is not worth getting and is the worst app on the planet this old lady was trying to make me become a trump supporter and I said never and I was harassed by a old lady just for telling her never because I don’t believe in the fact that trump has decided to build walls to keep imagrants away when they are trying to Bring their kids to a better place where they could get mini more choices but there is racist people on this app and you should not get it because how they treat people
attributes.title: Horrible app and should not get

attributes.review:
This app stole my hot Cheetos and changed them into regular orange Cheetos but didn’t even leave me with the orange ones. Somehow the bag of orange Cheetos was on the app inside my phone🤭🤬 The app stole my hot Cheetos. There is clearly only one explanation the government hacked me and took control of my pet monkey 🐒 making clusho (my monkey) take my Cheetos give them to the government and crush them up for The Big Cheeto’s (trump🤢) foundation. TBC could have just gone to the store and gotten Cheeto tanner but no he took control of clusho. This is animal abuse, theft, and hacking.👺🤬 
                                                            Clusho 2020🐒🇱🇷
